Irregular type torsion angle (wPsi_I & wPhi_I)

These two indices represent a classification of a residue as irregular type according to its value of psi and phi respectively. Both indices are defined as follow:

Where takes value one if the corresponding psi angle is between 15º and 94º or below -77º, otherwise takes cero. In the same way takes value one if the corresponding phi angle is below -159º or over -27º otherwise takes cero.
